title: Kessen no Quantum
description: Cavendish, Newton, Archimedes, Schrödinger, Maxwell, Einstein, etc... Scientists who have found the "laws of the world" are reincarnated as gifted and beautiful girls at the "turning point of the world" Industrial Revolution full of "disasters"!　With their special abilities using science, they begin to fight to the death!
author: Sasaki Yoshiaki
